sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT MAGICLH_ FROM autoline_sync_status where tablename_ = ''',pipeline().parameters.headerlogTable, ''' and dms =''',pipeline().parameters.dms,'''')

dependsOn.activity: Check if syncStatus contains data from yesterday

value.value: @string(activity('Check if syncStatus contains data from yesterday').output.value[0].MAGICLH_)

ifTrueActivities.name: Check if syncStatus contains data from yesterday

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('if (select count(*) FROM dbo.autoline_sync_status WHERE cast(timestamp_ as date) <> cast(getdate() as date) and dms = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''') <> 0 
		delete from [dbo].[autoline_headerlog] where postdate < cast(getdate() as date) and dms = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,'''

select min(magiclh) as [MAGICLH_] from (
		select min(magiclh) as magiclh from [dbo].[autoline_headerlog] where bedrijf = ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,''' and doctype = ''''  and dms = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' and time_ > cast( DATEPART(HOUR, GETDATE()) - 1 as numeric(4,2))
		union select [MAGICLH_] + 1 from dbo.autoline_sync_status WHERE tablename_ = ''', pipeline().parameters.headerlogTable,'''  and dms = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''') a')

@concat('SELECT  ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' as DMS, ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,''' as BEDRIJF,*
FROM OPENQUERY(', pipeline().parameters.dms,', ''SELECT  magiclh, wipno, doctype, postdate, time_  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.headerlogTable,' where magiclh >= ', variables('magiclh_'), ''')')

@concat('DECLARE @json NVARCHAR(MAX)
set @json = N''',string(activity('Get new Headerlog records').output.value),'''

    SELECT new.* FROM  
 OPENJSON ( @json ) 
WITH (   
              DMS   varchar(200) ''$.DMS'' ,  
              bedrijf     varchar(20)     ''$.BEDRIJF'',  
              magiclh numeric(20,0) ''$.MAGICLH'',  
              wipno numeric(20,0)    ''$.WIPNO'',
		    doctype varchar(5) ''$.DOCTYPE'',
		    postdate date ''$.POSTDATE'',
		    time_ numeric(4,2) ''$.TIME_''
 ) new
     LEFT JOIN autoline_headerlog prev ON prev.bedrijf = ''', pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,''' 
                                      AND prev.dms = new.dms
                                      AND prev.Magiclh = new.magiclh
                                      AND prev.doctype = new.doctype
WHERE prev.Magiclh IS NULL
      AND new.dms = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' and new.bedrijf = ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf, ''''	 )

@concat('DECLARE @json NVARCHAR(MAX)
set @json = N''',string(activity('Get werkorders').output.value),'''

SELECT DISTINCT STUFF(
(
    SELECT '','' + CAST(wipno AS VARCHAR)
    FROM
    (
SELECT DISTINCT wipno FROM  
 OPENJSON ( @json ) 
WITH (   
              DMS   varchar(200) ''$.DMS'' ,  
              bedrijf     varchar(20)     ''$.bedrijf'',  
              magiclh numeric(20,0) ''$.magiclh'',  
              wipno numeric(20,0)    ''$.wipno'',
		    doctype varchar(5) ''$.doctype'',
		    postdate date ''$.postdate'',
		    time_ numeric(4,2) ''$.time_''
 )  where doctype <> ''''
) sub FOR XML PATH('''')
), 1, 1, '''') as werkorders
	 
	 
	 ')

@concat('DECLARE @json NVARCHAR(MAX)
set @json = N''',string(activity('Get werkorders').output.value),'''

DECLARE @magiclh VARCHAR(MAX)

SELECT DISTINCT STUFF(
(
    SELECT '','' + CAST(magiclh AS VARCHAR)
    FROM
    (
SELECT DISTINCT magiclh FROM  
 OPENJSON ( @json ) 
WITH (   
              magiclh numeric(10,0) ''$.magiclh''
             
 )  
) sub FOR XML PATH('''')
), 1, 1, '''') as magiclh



	 ')

@concat('DECLARE @json NVARCHAR(MAX)
set @json = N''',string(activity('Get werkorders').output.value),'''


SELECT DISTINCT * FROM  
 OPENJSON ( @json ) 
WITH (   
              DMS   varchar(200) ''$.DMS'' ,  
              BEDRIJF varchar(20)     ''$.bedrijf'',  
              MAGICLH numeric(20,0) ''$.magiclh'',  
              WIPNO numeric(20,0)    ''$.wipno'',
		    DOCTYPE varchar(5) ''$.doctype'',
		    POSTDATE date ''$.postdate'',
		    TIME_ numeric(4,2) ''$.time_''
 ) ')

preCopyScript.value:
@{concat('DELETE FROM autoline_headerlog
WHERE bedrijf = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,'
      AND DMS = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,'''
      AND magiclh IN
(',activity('Select magiclh').output.value[0].magiclh,')')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' as DMS, ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,''' as BEDRIJF,* FROM OPENQUERY(',pipeline().parameters.dms,',''SELECT ACCOUNT ,CHASSIS ,CREATED ,CUSTCONT ,CUSTNAME ,DATEIN ,DATEOUT, DATEREG ,DELFLAG ,DEPT ,FRANCODE ,INVNO ,MAGICT ,MAGICV ,MODEL ,OPBOOKIN ,PHONE ,REGNO ,REPREP ,SALTYPE ,SERTEXT ,SERVCODE ,TEXT001 ,TEXT002 ,TEXT003 ,TEXT004 ,TIMEIN ,TIMEOUT ,WIPNO ,VSBNO ,WDATEOUT ,MILEAGE, WDATEIN, WTIMEIN ,WLINOUT, OPCREATE, OPBOOKOU, OPINVOIC, CUSTWAIT, COURTREQ, WIPPARTS FROM ',pipeline().parameters.headerrecordsTable,' WHERE WIPNO in (', variables('werkorders'), ') '')' )

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('delete from autoline_headerrecords where DMS =''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' and BEDRIJF = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,' and WIPNO in (',variables('werkorders'),')')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' as DMS, ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,''' as BEDRIJF,* FROM OPENQUERY(',pipeline().parameters.dms,',''SELECT ACCOUNT ,ACTLINE ,ALLOWED ,BONUSTIM ,CONTRIB ,DATECOST ,DEPT ,DESC_ ,DISCPC ,EXTPRICE ,FRANCODE ,INVOICE ,INVSTAT ,LINE ,LOADSTAT ,MENU ,MENUCODE ,MENUFLAG ,MENUPRCE ,RATE ,RTSCODE ,RTSCOMPY ,SALTYPE ,TAKEN ,TYPEANAL ,TYPECODE ,WIPNO ,WLCLOCKR FROM ',pipeline().parameters.labourlinesTable,' where WIPNO in (', variables('werkorders'), ') '')' )

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('delete from autoline_labourlines where DMS =''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' and BEDRIJF = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,' and WIPNO in (',variables('werkorders'),')')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' as DMS, ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,''' as BEDRIJF,* FROM OPENQUERY(',pipeline().parameters.dms,',''SELECT ACCOUNT ,DATEIN,DISCOUNT ,INVSTAT ,LINE ,ORDERQTY ,ORDSTAT ,PRODGRP ,SELLPRCE ,WIPNO ,PART ,ACTLINE ,INVOICE ,DESCRIPN ,DECARDED ,DEPT,CONTRIB,EXTPRICE FROM ',pipeline().parameters.partlinesTable,' where WIPNO in (', variables('werkorders'), ')'')' )

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('delete from autoline_partslines where DMS =''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' and BEDRIJF = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,' and WIPNO in (',variables('werkorders'),')')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT cast(DATEI_ as varchar) as DATEI_, case when DATEI_ <> cast(getdate() as date) then 0.01 else isnull(TIMEI_, 1.00) end as TIMEI_ FROM autoline_sync_status where tablename_ = ''',pipeline().parameters.clockentriesTable, ''' and dms =''',pipeline().parameters.dms,'''')

activities.name: If DATEI_ is smaller then today

dependsOn.activity: If DATEI_ is smaller then today

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select min(timei) as vtime  from autoline_clockentries where timeo = 0 and wipno <> 0 and datei >= getdate()-1 and dms = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms, ''' and bedrijf = ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,'''')

@concat('DECLARE @jsontemp NVARCHAR(MAX)
set @jsontemp = N''',string(activity('Get clockentries').output.value),'''

DECLARE @json NVARCHAR(MAX)
set @json = N''',string(activity('Get clockentries today').output.value),'''

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM  
 OPENJSON ( @json ) 
WITH (   
	DMS varchar(50) ''$.DMS'',
	BEDRIJF int ''$.BEDRIJF'',
	ADJDATE date ''$.ADJDATE'',
	ADJDESC char(30) ''$.ADJDESC'',
	ADJMODE char(1) ''$.ADJMODE'',
	ADJTIME numeric(4, 2) ''$.ADJTIME'',
	ADJUSER char(8) ''$.ADJUSER'',
	ALLOWED numeric(11, 2) ''$.ALLOWED'',
	ANALYSIS char(8) ''$.ANALYSIS'',
	DATEI datetime ''$.DATEI'',
	DATEO date ''$.DATEO'',
	FACTOR numeric(6, 3) ''$.FACTOR'',
	IDLE char(1) ''$.IDLE'',
	REASON char(1) ''$.REASON'',
	RESOURCE varchar(10) ''$.RESOURCE'',
	SEQ numeric(10, 0) ''$.SEQ'',
	SHIFT char(1) ''$.SHIFT'',
	STATE numeric(2, 0) ''$.STATE'',
	TAKEN numeric(11, 2) ''$.TAKEN'',
	TEAM char(1) ''$.TEAM'',
	TERMID numeric(4, 0) ''$.TERMID'',
	TIMEI numeric(4, 2) ''$.TIMEI'',
	TIMEO numeric(4, 2) ''$.TIMEO'',
	WIPLINE numeric(4, 0) ''$.WIPLINE'',
	WIPNO numeric(5, 0) ''$.WIPNO''
 ) bron where bron.DATEI >= ''',variables('date'), '''
and not exists(SELECT * FROM OPENJSON ( @jsontemp ) 
WITH (   
	DMS varchar(50) ''$.DMS'',
	BEDRIJF int ''$.BEDRIJF'',
	ADJDATE date ''$.ADJDATE'',
	ADJDESC char(30) ''$.ADJDESC'',
	ADJMODE char(1) ''$.ADJMODE'',
	ADJTIME numeric(4, 2) ''$.ADJTIME'',
	ADJUSER char(8) ''$.ADJUSER'',
	ALLOWED numeric(11, 2) ''$.ALLOWED'',
	ANALYSIS char(8) ''$.ANALYSIS'',
	DATEI datetime ''$.DATEI'',
	DATEO date ''$.DATEO'',
	FACTOR numeric(6, 3) ''$.FACTOR'',
	IDLE char(1) ''$.IDLE'',
	REASON char(1) ''$.REASON'',
	RESOURCE varchar(10) ''$.RESOURCE'',
	SEQ numeric(10, 0) ''$.SEQ'',
	SHIFT char(1) ''$.SHIFT'',
	STATE numeric(2, 0) ''$.STATE'',
	TAKEN numeric(11, 2) ''$.TAKEN'',
	TEAM char(1) ''$.TEAM'',
	TERMID numeric(4, 0) ''$.TERMID'',
	TIMEI numeric(4, 2) ''$.TIMEI'',
	TIMEO numeric(4, 2) ''$.TIMEO'',
	WIPLINE numeric(4, 0) ''$.WIPLINE'',
	WIPNO numeric(5, 0) ''$.WIPNO''
 ) temp where temp.resource = bron.resource and 
                  temp.[DATEI] = bron.datei and temp.timei = bron.timei and temp.seq = bron.seq  and temp.DMS = bron.DMS and temp.bedrijf = bron.bedrijf) 
 
	 
	 
	' )

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('delete from autoline_clockentries where DMS =''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' and BEDRIJF = ',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf, ' and DATEI>= ''',variables('date') ,'''')}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('
    SELECT ISNULL(MAX(cast(cast(DATEI as date) as varchar)), ''',variables('date'),''') as DATEI,
cast( DATEPART(HOUR, dateadd(minute,-45,getdate())) as numeric(4,2)) + cast(datepart(minute, dateadd(minute,-45,getdate())) as numeric(4,2)) / 100 as TIMEI
    FROM autoline_clockentries WHERE DMS = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,''' and BEDRIJF = ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,'''')

@concat('
IF OBJECT_ID(''tempdb..#temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,''') IS NOT NULL DROP Table #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,'

DECLARE @date_ AS VARCHAR(50) = ''',variables('date'), '''
DECLARE @time_ AS NUMERIC(4, 2) = ''',variables('time'), '''
DECLARE @tablename_ AS VARCHAR(50) = ''',pipeline().parameters.clockentriesTable, '''
DECLARE @DMS AS VARCHAR(10) = ''', pipeline().parameters.dms,'''
DECLARE @bedrijf AS VARCHAR(2) = ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,'''
DECLARE @timeVC_ AS VARCHAR(6);
DECLARE @timeVC0_ AS VARCHAR(6);
CREATE TABLE #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,'
([DMS]      [VARCHAR](10), 
 [BEDRIJF]  [INT], 
 [ADJDATE]  [DATE], 
 [ADJDESC]  [VARCHAR](30), 
 [ADJMODE]  [VARCHAR](1), 
 [ADJTIME]  [NUMERIC](4, 2), 
 [ADJUSER]  [VARCHAR](8), 
 [ALLOWED]  [NUMERIC](11, 2), 
 [ANALYSIS] [VARCHAR](8), 
 [DATEI]    [DATE], 
 [DATEO]    [DATE], 
 [FACTOR]   [NUMERIC](6, 3), 
 [IDLE]     [VARCHAR](1), 
 [REASON]   [VARCHAR](1), 
 [RESOURCE] [VARCHAR](10), 
 [SEQ]      [NUMERIC](10, 0), 
 [SHIFT]    [VARCHAR](1), 
 [STATE]    [NUMERIC](2, 0), 
 [TAKEN]    [NUMERIC](11, 2), 
 [TEAM]     [VARCHAR](1), 
 [TERMID]   [NUMERIC](4, 0), 
 [TIMEI]    [NUMERIC](4, 2), 
 [TIMEO]    [NUMERIC](4, 2), 
 [WIPLINE]  [NUMERIC](4, 0), 
 [WIPNO]    [NUMERIC](5, 0)
);
SET @timeVC_ =
(
    SELECT CAST(@time_ AS VARCHAR(5))
);
EXEC (''insert into #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,' (DMS,BEDRIJF,ADJDATE ,ADJDESC ,ADJMODE ,ADJTIME ,ADJUSER ,ALLOWED ,ANALYSIS ,DATEI ,DATEO ,FACTOR ,IDLE
            		,REASON ,RESOURCE ,SEQ ,SHIFT ,STATE ,TAKEN ,TEAM ,TERMID ,TIMEI ,TIMEO ,WIPLINE,WIPNO) 
            select ''''''+@DMS+'''''' as DMS, ''+@bedrijf+'' as bedrijf,* from openquery(''+@DMS+'', ''''SELECT 
            		ADJDATE ,ADJDESC ,ADJMODE ,ADJTIME ,ADJUSER ,ALLOWED ,ANALYSIS ,DATEI ,DATEO ,FACTOR ,IDLE
            		,REASON ,RESOURCE ,SEQ ,SHIFT ,STATE ,TAKEN ,TEAM ,TERMID ,TIMEI ,TIMEO ,WIPLINE,WIPNO
            FROM ''+@tablename_+'' where DATEI >= ''''''''''+@date_+'''''''''' and (TIMEI >= ''+@timeVC_+'' OR (ADJDATE >= ''''''''''+@date_+'''''''''' and ADJTIME >= ''+@timeVC_+''))  '''')'');

SET @timeVC0_ = (SELECT CASE WHEN CAST(''',activity('Get VTIME').output.value[0].vtime, ''' AS VARCHAR(5)) = '''' THEN NULL ELSE CAST(''',activity('Get VTIME').output.value[0].vtime, ''' AS VARCHAR(5)) END)

IF @timeVC0_ IS NOT NULL
    BEGIN
        EXEC (''insert into #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,' (DMS,BEDRIJF,ADJDATE ,ADJDESC ,ADJMODE ,ADJTIME ,ADJUSER ,ALLOWED ,ANALYSIS ,DATEI ,DATEO ,FACTOR ,IDLE
            		,REASON ,RESOURCE ,SEQ ,SHIFT ,STATE ,TAKEN ,TEAM ,TERMID ,TIMEI ,TIMEO ,WIPLINE,WIPNO) 
            select ''''''+@DMS+'''''' as DMS, ''+@bedrijf+'' as bedrijf,* from openquery(''+@DMS+'', ''''SELECT 
            		ADJDATE ,ADJDESC ,ADJMODE ,ADJTIME ,ADJUSER ,ALLOWED ,ANALYSIS ,DATEI ,DATEO ,FACTOR ,IDLE
            		,REASON ,RESOURCE ,SEQ ,SHIFT ,STATE ,TAKEN ,TEAM ,TERMID ,TIMEI ,TIMEO ,WIPLINE,WIPNO
            FROM ''+@tablename_+'' where DATEO >= ''''''''''+@date_+'''''''''' and (TIMEO >= ''+@timeVC0_+'')'''') bron
                where not exists (select * from #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,' temp where 
            							temp.[DATEI] = bron.datei and temp.resource collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = bron.resource collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS and temp.seq = bron.seq and 
            							temp.timei = bron.timei and temp.wipno = bron.wipno and temp.DMS = ''''''+@DMS+'''''' and temp.bedrijf = ''+@bedrijf+'') '');
END;
IF
(
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,'
) > 0
    BEGIN

      select distinct * from #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,'
DROP Table #temp_clockentries',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,pipeline().parameters.dms,'
END

')

@{concat('SELECT MAX(MAGICLH) as magiclh FROM autoline_headerlog
WHERE bedrijf = ''',pipeline().parameters.bedrijf,'''
      AND DMS = ''',pipeline().parameters.dms,'''
      ')}
